query:
INSERT INTO orderbook_snapshots (market_id, no_best_ask, no_best_bid, no_asks, no_bids, captured_at)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, NOW())
        ON CONFLICT (market_id) DO UPDATE SET
            no_best_ask = $2,
            no_best_bid = $3,
            no_asks = $4,
            no_bids = $5,
            captured_at = NOW()
